name: Land.dev
long_description:
America has a land problem. 

We are spending more, and building less. 

American real estate developers waste their time navigating data scattered across 23,000 jurisdictions. An apartment builder must check dozens of different databases, parse hundreds of PDFs, and still might miss a critical detail buried in an ancient document.

We use AI to normalize the countryâ€™s land data into one source of truth, so developers can focus on building.
one_liner: Solving America's Land Problem with AI
